promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a dynamic epic boar steel-type wearing ornate gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or steel. Ony answer with the generated name:

It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: meteor-mash, fury-swipes. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word boar or steel or the ability names. promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, boar-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Gemboar survives desert heat by burrowing underground, striking foes with its iron-clad meteor hammers and fury-filled swipes.
